execution_plan.description: Aggregate per-user chat membership count and message count from the chat database (app_chat).
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.username AS s1__username, COUNT(DISTINCT chat_members.chat_id) AS s1__chats_count, COUNT(messages.id) AS s1__messages_count FROM users LEFT JOIN chat_members ON chat_members.user_id = users.id LEFT JOIN messages ON messages.sended_by = users.id GROUP BY users.username;

execution_plan.description: Aggregate per-user posts count from the application database (app). Will be joined to chat aggregates by username to combine counts across systems.
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.username AS s2__username, COUNT(posts.id) AS s2__posts_count FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON posts.user_id = users.id GROUP BY users.username;
